text: 15.7: FG 10.1-43Mbe mbe phorgap buni vhɨrvera ndi thɨgar mbarigim, Pita mbaram khavgia thɨgap, khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde nza phorgɨp Zisas zɨn vui gumgi, nde khueŋ kaŋgi, Fhe Bakɨme fhum nza kha Zisas farasegi 12 thɨgi ŋaara gumgi, Fhe Bakɨme mba ŋaarar nzan farve khɨngi. Ana mba ŋaarar nzan farve khɨngiap, ana khueŋ nzuav na farasarigi. Gu ana buni vhuuiŋ bun harigi ŋgui gumgi gu mbigi ga suaŋrim, mbe ana buni vhuuiŋ mbararav mbe ana khothivɨrga.
